captions.text:
Whassap yo? This week we tryin to
keep it together with Things Fall Apart by
Chinua Achebe.

Okonkwo got one of da illest reps
of any hood in the Nigerian Umuofia clan.

But bein high baller don’t run in the family.
Errybody know that Okonkwo’s daddy was nuthin

but a broke-ass scrub and now Okonkwo gotta
be a hard-ass hustla to shake off dat family
shame.

When some fool mercs a dame from
Umoufia, Okonkwo gotta take care of his boy

Ikemefuna to make everything cool between
the clans. Okonkwo got mad love for this kid

even though he don’t show it. And it ain’t
long before Ikemefuna starts callin Okonkwo
daddy.

Then one day the Oracle say dat fool Ikemefuna
gotta get put in

dirt. Some geezer named Ezeudu tells Okonkwo
he best stay away from dat mess. Cuz no matter

how much of a bad-ass thug you are, killin
yo own son is whack.

But Okonkwo don’t wanna be seen as
no sensitive bitch, so he straps up ready

to bang out. When Ikemefuna cries “lil help,
pops?”, Okonkwo ENDS dat fool. And for the
next few days, Okonkwo all torn up.

sh** gets even more cray for
Okonkwo during his boy Ezeudu’s funeral.

During the salute, Okonkwo’s gat accidentally
busts a cap in Ezeudu’s son! So Okonkwo

and his family get booted outta town for 7
years!

Okonkwo and his people shack up at
some hood called Mbanta. While he gone, a

bunch of bible thumpin crackers roll up to
Umuofia tryna convert homies all ova town.

Soon they got a whole new government up in
this piece!

When Okonkwo gets back home, he all
like “Man who are all these honkies?!”

So he and his tribal leader homies roll up
to a church and stomp dat sh** to the ground.
“This our turf, sucka!”

After gettin thrown in the slammer
for a bit, Okonkwo rallies errybody to wage

WAR against them imperalist fools. When one
of dem oppressors steps to, Okonkwo takes
that fool OUT.

But when he tries to get his posse
to revolt against these haters like all good

Ufuomians do, they all back down like a bunch
o’ bitches.

Later, the top-dawg white man rolls
up on Okonkwo’s crib to take him downtown.

But when he walk in, Okonkwo hangin by a noose.
Fool took himself out for good.

First thing you best recognize is
that lil’ Achebe came up in Nigeria after

it was taken over by the
west.

Even though this book definitely
got beef with the empire that did Igbo culture

straight dirty, good art don’t just give
one perspective.

See, Okonkwo reppin all the social
values of the ol Igbo society. He clockin

mad courage, goes hard for the hood, and don’t
let no candy- ass emotions get in the way.

And for bein the realeast brutha on the streets,
the elders trust him to raise Ikemefuna. But
it ain’t all gravy for Okonkwo.

When time comes to kill Ikemefuna,
Okonkwo knows bein the one to shank his boy

gonna piss of the Goddess real bad. But he
ain’t no lazy coward like his daddy, and

fool desperate to prove it. After Ikemefuna
dead, it’s just one tragedy after another

til Okonkwo offs himself. Even his main man
Obierika tell him dat was a messed up thing
to do.

Ain’t no doubt that them crooked
ass imperialists took a big ol dump on Africa.

But like we can see with Okonkwo icing his
boy and disrespecting the goddess, maybe things
start fallin apart before they got there.

Just like Yeats preachin in the
poem that opens the book, it ain’t that

one culture know the world better than another.
Whether it be Igbo culture, western culture,

or whateverthefu**- time is enemy. And as
time goes on, any culture can fall apart.

But you know what don’t fall apart?
These sick threadz you can get at my store.
See y’all next week! Peace.

title: Things Fall Apart - Thug Notes Summary and Analysis

comments.text:
Glad to see we came to the same conclusion in analysis. Things fall apart, 
usually is just a matter of pace. I sympathized with onkonkwo's dismay at 
seeing the culture he grew in becoming so quickly dismantled and western 
imperialist change was pretty effed up but onkonko's people also had some 
effed up practices that l wasn't sad to see abolished but that might be my 
white man's upbringing talking. Anyway the book makes a point of alluding 
to how the old ways were changing anyway. This is a pretty good read, I'd 
definitely recommend it. ﻿

honoring yourselves.

comments.text:
God, humanity at its lowest has got to be in the YouTube comments section.

Every race has done fucked up shit in its past, so get over your fucking 
biases, whatever direction they may be in. Unity is my enemy, because unity 
never means what it implies... It is the consolidation of one group at the 
expense of another. Oh, and one last thing, words only have the meaning 
that we as a society decide to attach to them, so we make a conscious 
decision every time we use a word that that's the meaning we wish that word 
to connotate.
comments.author: Ser Gareth

comments.text:

comments.author: Anthony Jefferson (Tanker7)

comments.text:
Except I wasn't arguing about race, I was arguing about ignorance and 
hypocrisy. When someone says one derogatory term is okay and one is off 
limits, it sends the wrong message and is, in my opinion, the reason race 
is still such a big issue. And I think it is fairly obvious that his 
comment is satirical in nature, but that doesn't stop Camille's statement 
from being, like I said, hypocritical. I normally couldn't be asked to 
reply to someone, but that kind of thinking really irks me.
comments.author: Maynard Plumm

comments.text:

that intentionally to spark a hideous race argument for shits and giggles.
(see above)

comments.text:
I did not attack you, I merely stated my opinion, and my opinion is that

bigot. And nowhere did you make any attempt to "come halfway", you 
completely dismissed me. But yeah, you're right, nice discussion.

comments.author: MrJarth

comments.text:
But that is not what you said, and it is EXACTLY what I said. You're 
obviously backing water here, and can't stick to your guns. Next time don't 
spout such ignorant bullshit, you set us all back with that biased garbage. 
I really don't care about race, but people who are ignorant and just can't 
admit it piss me off quite a lot.
comments.author: Maynard Plumm

comments.text:
+Giygas the Destroyer Oh and responding to your past comment I never once 
said black v. white was the only problem! There are many prejudicial 
problems everywhere! I just am familiar with racism because of my cultural 
background, not really backwards when you think about it! :) Also, I'm 
pretty sure derogatory terms are still not okay, but "nigger" and "cracker" 
DEFINITELY don't carry the same amount of weight. Why I say this is because 
the n-word has such a horrible background (years of slavery, you've heard 
it all), but what about the word cracker? Yes, it is still a pejorative but 
think about it a little, if a black police officer called you cracker, 
would you be afraid for unjust profiling? Because if a white police officer 
called me nigger, I would be terrified! Everybody experiences prejudice, 
nonetheless. That's just my opinion, of course :)
comments.author: Camille Okonkwo

comments.text: So you do not deny that your opinion is highly hypocritical and asinine?
comments.author: Maynard Plumm

comments.text: Get over it, honkey.
comments.author: Jake Magulick

comments.text:
When your opinion is as poisonous as it is, I really think you should keep 
it to yourself.
comments.author: Maynard Plumm

comments.text: Everyone is entitled to an opinion! :)
comments.author: Camille Okonkwo

comments.text:
+Camille Okonkwo Okay, wow. One, just because people use the word "nigger", 
it is okay for other derogatory terms to be tossed around casually? No. 
Two. I get racism is still around, but don't act like white people are the 
only racists out there. People hate other people who are different, a lot 
of the time. Whether it be due to history (The whole black vs. white thing 
in America, where both sides are equal in their hate and ignorance, as 
shown by the points you've tried to make) or maybe culture shock (the 
current situation with a lot of Arabic immigrants into Middle and Eastern 
Europe), people tend to band together against, well, any difference. You've 
done nothing but display ignorance here, and I honestly think that your 
kind of hypocritical, backwards thinking is holding humanity back. We need 
to forget about bullshit like race and focus on more important things, like 
how the HUMAN RACE is going to survive on this increasingly doomed world we 
call home.
comments.author: Maynard Plumm

comments.text:
+Camille Okonkwo Two things a derogatory term for a specific race would 
qualify as racist. And if by "when your race is prejudiced against for 
hundreds of years" you are referring to the white populace as a whole then 
I would like to point out that for as long as caste systems have existed in 
the world there have been slaves, yes white people included in fact almost 
every race has experienced it at some point in time, its a sad truth but 
yes slavery has existed for quite some time and it is only by looking 
forward that we can put humanities dark deed of slavery behind us. Anyways 
on a lighter note, LOVE thug notes and Sparky Sweets Ph.D keep doing what 
your doing, your ability to summarize and analyze literature is amazing!!!
